DOC.brief_summary: This report 10 year result combine Transpupillary thermotherapy ( TTT ) treatment Indocyanine green ( ICG ) control small medium-sized choroidal melanoma .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Results Combined Transpupillary Thermotherapy ( TTT ) Indocyanine Green ( ICG ) Based Photodynamic Therapy ( PDT ) Choroidal Melanoma
DOC.detailed_description: The study do Clinical practice set . Forty six eye 46 patient small medium-sized choroidal melanoma treat i-TTT use infrared light deliver diode laser . All patient evaluate rule systemic metastasis underwent complete ophthalmological evaluation include : Slit lamp biomicroscopy , dilate fundus examination , Fluorescein angiography , Optical coherence tomography A/B ultrasonography . Main outcome measure : Changes visual acuity , complication associate treatment local control tumor .
DOC.criteria: Small mediumsized choroidal melanoma Patients older 18 year old . Patients read sign informed consent . Patients ocular inflammation . Patients another active ocular disease .
